Your unusual rest cycle allows you to recover faster. As long as you rest for 12 hours, you gain the effects of the [Fast Recovery](/Feats.aspx?ID=782) general feat and you can go 20 hours without resting before becoming [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15).
